newsitem.title: SYRIA: Syria offers 10,000 tonnes of lentils for sale.
newsitem.headline: Syria offers 10,000 tonnes of lentils for sale.

text.p: Syria's General Establishment for Cereal Processing and Trade (GECPT) has offered 10,000 tonnes of lentils for export, an official spokesman said.
He told reuters that an international call for prices had been issued and November 11 was set as final date to receive price offers. Results would be announced on November 12.
He said the quantity of the 1996 crops included 5,000 tonnes whole red lentils and 5,000 tonnes split red lentils.
